sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT M.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,M.GIS_ASSETS_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_CD ,M.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', M.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NM ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM(M.PRT_FCLTY_SE) AS FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM ,M.PRT_FCLTY_NM AS PRT_FCLTY_NM ,M.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD AS PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD ,M.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT AS PRT_FCLTY_UNIT ,TO_CHAR(M.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT ,TO_CHAR(M.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT ,GAM_GETENTRPSNM(M.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD,'1') AS PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS ,TO_CHAR(M.PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT ,M.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT ,M.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER ,M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ,M.FCLTS_MNG_NO ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM(M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F M
WHERE 1=1
M.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
M.PRT_FCLTY_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
M.PRT_FCLTY_NM like '%'||#sPrtFcltyNm#||'%'
M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO like '%'||#sFcltsMngGroupNo#||'%'
) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F M WHERE 1=1
M.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
M.PRT_FCLTY_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
M.PRT_FCLTY_NM like '%'||#sPrtFcltyNm#||'%'
M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO like '%'||#sFcltsMngGroupNo#||'%'

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', D.PRT_AT_CODE) AS PRT_AT_CODE , TO_CHAR(D.USAGE_PD_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ~ ' || TO_CHAR(D.USAGE_PD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD , GAM_GETENTRPSNM(M.ENTRPSCD, '1') AS ENTRPSCD , TO_CHAR(M.REQST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQST_DT , TO_CHAR(M.PRMISN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRMISN_DT , M.PAY_MTH AS PAY_MTH , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM016', M.TAXT_SE) AS TAXT_NM , D.USAGE_AR AS USAGE_AR , D.USAGE_PURPS AS USAGE_PURPS , D.USAGE_DTLS AS USAGE_DTLS , D.COMPUT_DTLS AS COMPUT_DTLS , D.OLNLP AS OLNLP , D.APPLC_TARIFF AS APPLC_TARIFF , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019',D.APPLC_MTH) AS APPLC_MTH , D.FEE AS FEE
FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F D, ASSETS_RENT_F M WHERE 1=1 AND D.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND D.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND D.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND M.PRMISN_YN = 'Y'
D.USAGE_PD_FROM > TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')-1
D.USAGE_PD_FROM < TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
AND D.PRT_AT_CODE = M.PRT_AT_CODE AND D.MNG_YEAR = M.MNG_YEAR AND D.MNG_NO = M.MNG_NO AND D.MNG_CNT = M.MNG_CNT
ORDER BY D.PRT_AT_CODE DESC, D.MNG_YEAR DESC, D.MNG_NO, D.MNG_CNT ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F D, ASSETS_RENT_F M WHERE 1=1 AND D.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND D.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND D.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND M.PRMISN_YN = 'Y'
D.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
D.USAGE_PD_FROM <= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND D.PRT_AT_CODE = M.PRT_AT_CODE AND D.MNG_YEAR = M.MNG_YEAR AND D.MNG_NO = M.MNG_NO AND D.MNG_CNT = M.MNG_CNT

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT GAM_GET_FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM(M.FCLTS_JOB_SE) AS FCLTS_JOB_NM ,M.QC_MNG_SEQ AS QC_MNG_SEQ ,M.ENFORCE_YEAR AS ENFORCE_YEAR ,M.QC_MNG_NM AS QC_MNG_NM ,TO_CHAR(M.QC_INSP_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QC_INSP_DT ,M.QC_INSP_SE AS QC_INSP_SE ,GAM_GET_QC_INSP_SE_NM(M.QC_INSP_SE) AS QC_INSP_SE_NM ,M.QC_INSP_INSTT_NM AS QC_INSP_INSTT_NM ,M.RESPON_ENGINEER_NM AS RESPON_ENGINEER_NM ,TO_CHAR(M.QC_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QC_BEGIN_DT ,TO_CHAR(M.QC_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QC_END_DT ,M.QC_INSP_AMT AS QC_INSP_AMT ,GAM_GET_STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM(M.STTUS_EVL_LVL) AS STTUS_EVL_LVL ,M.QC_INSP_RESULT AS QC_INSP_RESULT ,M.ACTION_CN AS ACTION_CN ,M.RM AS RM ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM(M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM
FROM QC_MNG_DTLS_F M WHERE 1=1
AND M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo#
AND EXISTS (SELECT F.FCLTS_MNG_NO FROM QC_MNG_OBJ_FCLTS_F F WHERE F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = R.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AND F.FCLTS_JOB_SE = R.FCLTS_JOB_SE AND F.QC_MNG_SEQ=R.QC_MNG_SEQ AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO =#fcltsMngNo#)
M.QC_BEGIN_DT >= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
M.QC_BEGIN_DT <= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
) S ) A

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_NM , GAM_GET_MNTN_FCLTS_CNST_INFO(M.CTRT_NO, M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_NM) MNTN_FCLTS_CNST_INFO , M.PLANNER_NM , M.CNST_CHARG_NM , TO_CHAR(M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT , TO_CHAR(M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') MNTN_RPR_CNST_END_DT , M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_AMT , M.RM , M.REG_USR , M.REGIST_DT , M.UPD_USR , M.UPDT_DT , M.CTRT_NO , (SELECT I.CTRT_NM FROM CTRT_INFO_F I WHERE I.CTRT_NO = M.CTRT_NO) CTRT_NM , M.FCLTS_JOB_SE ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM(M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , M.MNTN_RPR_SEQ , M.MNTN_RPR_SE , M.MNTN_SUB_RPR_SE , GAM_GET_MNTN_RPR_SE_NM(M.MNTN_RPR_SE) MNTN_RPR_SE_NM , GAM_GET_MNTN_RPR_SE_NM(M.MNTN_SUB_RPR_SE) MNTN_SUB_RPR_SE_NM , M.MNTN_RPR_PART , M.MNTN_RPR_CN , M.MNTN_RPR_BDGT , M.CNSTRTR , M.RESPON_ENGINEER , M.ENFORCE_YEAR FROM MNTN_RPR_DTLS_F M WHERE 1=1 AND M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo#
AND EXISTS (SELECT F.FCLTS_MNG_NO FROM MNTN_RPR_OBJ_FCLTS_F F WHERE F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = R.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AND F.FCLTS_JOB_SE = R.FCLTS_JOB_SE AND F.MNTN_RPR_SEQ=R.MNTN_RPR_SEQ AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO =#fcltsMngNo#)
M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT >= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT <= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
) S ) A

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(R.FLAW_RPR_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_RPR_START_DT , TO_CHAR(R.FLAW_RPR_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_RPR_END_DT , R.FLAW_RPR_AMT , R.FLAW_RPR_CONTENTS , R.REG_USR , TO_CHAR(R.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') REGIST_DT , R.UPD_USR , TO_CHAR(R.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDT_DT , R.FLAW_RPR_ENTRPS_NM , R.FLAW_RPR_TY , TO_CHAR(R.FLAW_OCCRRNC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_OCCRRNC_DT , R.FLAW_RPR_COMPT_YN , R.FLAW_EXAM_SE , GAM_GET_FLAW_EXAM_SE_NM(R.FLAW_EXAM_SE) FLAW_EXAM_SE_NM , R.ENFORCE_YEAR , R.FLAW_RPR_NM , R.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , GAM_GET_FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM(R.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , R.FCLTS_JOB_SE , GAM_GET_FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM(R.FCLTS_JOB_SE) FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM , R.FLAW_RPR_SEQ , TO_CHAR(R.FLAW_EXAM_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') FLAW_EXAM_DT , R.FLAW_ENNC , R.FLAW_EXAM_RESULT , R.RM , R.CTRT_NO , R.FLAW_EXAM_USR , R.FLAW_EXAM_USR_DEPT , R.FLAW_EXAM_USR_NM FROM FLAW_RPR_DTLS_F R WHERE 1 = 1 AND R.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND EXISTS (SELECT F.FCLTS_MNG_NO FROM FLAW_RPR_OBJ_FCLTS_F F WHERE F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = R.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AND F.FCLTS_JOB_SE = R.FCLTS_JOB_SE AND F.FLAW_RPR_SEQ=R.FLAW_RPR_SEQ AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO =#fcltsMngNo#)
R.FLAW_EXAM_DT >= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
R.FLAW_EXAM_DT <= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
) S ) A
